name: v0.3.0
body:
## Using Bzlmod with Bazel 7 or greater

Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_d", version = "0.3.0")

d = use_extension("//d:extensions.bzl", "d")
d.toolchain(d_version = "auto")
use_repo(d, "d_toolchains")

register_toolchains("@d_toolchains//:all")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE.bazel` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "rules_d",
    sha256 = "9cdf1715b1db2575e83981b7cddc63fcc16c02bc0e835b6875a1f1a271016db3",
    strip_prefix = "rules_d-0.3.0",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_d/releases/download/v0.3.0/rules_d-v0.3.0.tar.gz",
)

######################
# rules_d setup #
######################
# Fetches the rules_d dependencies.
# If you want to have a different version of some dependency,
# you should fetch it *before* calling this.
# Alternatively, you can skip calling this function, so long as you've
# already fetched all the dependencies.
load("@rules_d//d:repositories.bzl", "d_register_toolchains", "rules_d_dependencies")

rules_d_dependencies()

d_register_toolchains(
    "d_toolchain",
    d_version = "auto",
)
```


## What's Changed
* Write versions bzl generator in d by @dcarp in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_d/pull/94
* chore(deps): update pre-commit hook crate-ci/typos to v1.37.0 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_d/pull/95
* chore(deps): update pre-commit hook crate-ci/typos to v1.37.1 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_d/pull/96
* fix: don't publish bcr PR as draft by @dcarp in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_d/pull/97
* fix: correct automatic release tagging delay to two weeks by @dcarp in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_d/pull/98
* chore(deps): update pre-commit hook crate-ci/typos to v1.37.2 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_d/pull/99
* feat: add 'env' and 'data' attributes for 'd_binary' and 'd_test' by @dcarp in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_d/pull/100
* chore(deps): update pre-commit hook crate-ci/typos to v1.38.0 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_d/pull/102
* chore(deps): update pre-commit hook crate-ci/typos to v1.38.1 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_d/pull/103


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_d/compare/v0.2.2...v0.3.0

## Using WORKSPACE

```starlark

http_archive(
    name = "rules_d",
    sha256 = "c05eb74af387662bd64459615596eede160f388b8182dfe2fac851a557203fbf",
    strip_prefix = "rules_d-0.2.0",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_d/releases/download/v0.2.0/rules_d-v0.2.0.tar.gz",
)

######################
# rules_d setup #
######################
# Fetches the rules_d dependencies.

# already fetched all the dependencies.

rules_d_dependencies()

d_register_toolchains(
    "d_toolchain",
    d_version = "auto",
)
```


## What's Changed
* Update bazel-contrib/publish-to-bcr action to v0.2.3 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_d/pull/79
* Update pre-commit hook crate-ci/typos to v1.35.8 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_d/pull/80
* Update pre-commit hook crate-ci/typos to v1.36.0 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_d/pull/81
* Update pre-commit hook keith/pre-commit-buildifier to v8.2.1 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_d/pull/82
* Update pre-commit hook crate-ci/typos to v1.36.2 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_d/pull/83
* Update bazel-contrib/publish-to-bcr action to v1 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_d/pull/84
* Update pre-commit hook commitizen-tools/commitizen to v4.9.0 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_d/pull/85
* Update pre-commit hook commitizen-tools/commitizen to v4.9.1 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_d/pull/86
* Fix rules_cc workspace integration for rules_cc 0.2.0 or newer by @dcarp in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_d/pull/87
* Update repo structure to repo-template@6470c76 by @dcarp in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_d/pull/89
* feat: Add imports and string_imports attributes by @dcarp in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_d/pull/90


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_d/compare/v0.1.3...v0.2.0
